patterns: I want to know the various IT departments in this hospital
responses: The department are: Inpatient clinical documentation, Inpatient Billing, Inpatient Registration, Health Information Management(HIM), Clinical orders and Inpatient lab results, Pharmacy Software, Patient location tracking systems, IV pumps and related software, Radiology imaging software.

patterns: Is the patient information kept private?
responses: Patient medical record is kept private and accessed on a need-to-know basis

responses: I will just check if he is available or on leave.
